thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Enhanced Fishing Gear (STU-2023)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Enhanced Fishing Gear (STU-2023) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Enhanced Fishing Gear (STU-2023)
text:
InventHelp, based in Pittsburgh, is submitting the SURE SET to appropriate companies for their potential feedback.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 25, 2015
"I wanted to improve my chances of catching fish," said an inventor from Tremonton, Utah. "I thought that if I had a faster, more efficient way to set the hook, then fish would be less likely to swim away. This need inspired me to come up with my fishing invention."
He created a prototype for the patent-pending SURE SET to hold a fishing rod and alert the user to a strike on the line. The device sets the hook quickly and effectively in the fish's mouth. This increases the chances of making a successful catch and makes fishing trips more productive and enjoyable. Furthermore, the accessory features a compact, easily portable design.
The original design was submitted to the Salt Lake City office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-STU-2023, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
